column3: “#ILoveLAKush This strain in particular is a very great  Hybrid. It's super purple and dense the taste is indescribable. Overall one of the best strains I've tried as a patient.”

“Picked up a gram of this and 2 gram of Los Angeles kush both took me on a joy ride to the moon amazing quality and smell would smoke again Audrey was a hard working bud tender dealt and help me with which was the best of the best without her I wouldn't have known any better thank you for all the help”
